q1.question: Do I need to register?
q1.answer: Yes, registration is required to manage your temporary mailboxes securely.

q2.question: How long do emails last?
q2.answer: Emails are stored temporarily and automatically deleted after they expire.

q3.question: Can I send emails?
q3.answer: Sending functionality is available for users with appropriate permissions.

q4.question: Can I have multiple mailboxes?
q4.answer: Yes, you can create and manage multiple temporary email addresses from a single account.

q5.question: How to access OpenAPI?
q5.answer: You can access the OpenAPI definition at https://docs.moemail.app/api.html#openapi. Authentication requires an API Key from your profile.
